en.intro.1.title: The Highest Number of Refugees Ever Seen
en.intro.1.text: Historically, people around the world have displaced from their home countries due to conflict, war, persecution and human rights violations. According to The UN Refugee Agency, there are about 20 million refugees whose origin country is identified worldwide by the end of 2017.
en.intro.2.title: Some countries are more densed in the number
en.intro.2.text: Two-thirds of all refugees worldwide come from just five countries: Syria, Afghanistan, South Sudan, Myanmar and Somalia. From Syria, which has been through severe civil war from 2011, 5.6 million people fled the country as refugees.
en.intro.3.title: Explore by yourself
en.intro.3.text: You can choose a country to know the total number of refugees over time. Click the Play button to see how the number have got changed over time.
